user.title: Connect to the Powerwall
user.description: The default password is printed inside the Backup Gateway for newer models. For older models, the default password is the last five characters of the serial number for Backup Gateway and can be found in the Tesla app.

confirm_discovery.title: [%key:component::powerwall::config::step::user::title%]
confirm_discovery.description: Do you want to set up {name} ({ip_address})?

error.wrong_version: Your Powerwall uses a software version that is not supported. Please consider upgrading or reporting this issue so it can be resolved.
